column1: Little Goat Diner////since i had already eaten breakfast and it was noon
column2: i had the veggie quesadilla because i honestly couldn't decide on a sandwich. it was THE BEST quesdilla i have ever had! to me
column3: no meat/all veggie options are usually not as fulfilling
column4: but this one was loaded! broccoli
column11: jalepenos who knows what else.. and the flour tortilla wasn't just your average floppy tortilla
column12: it held its shape and made eating the meal really easy! my fiancee had the bullseye french toast which was an awesome version topped with fried chicken
